main event: A civilian observed an unidentified object resembling a flat iron, almost the size of a kite, while looking out the window.
interesting points: The object was described as white with a black outline., The sighting was made at approximately 15 degrees above the horizon., The object was observed for about two minutes., The report concludes that the object was unidentified but suggests it could possibly be an aircraft, balloon, or astronomical object., The location of the sighting was close to South Weymouth, Massachusetts, and nearby Logan Airport.
sighted object: one object resembling a flat iron
witness description: a civilian who observed the object from a window
